description: Ms. codex. Title provided by cataloger. Physical description: 13 lines per page. Written in medium large naskh in black ink (faded to brown). Thick soft dark cream paper with chain lines and pulp visible. The edges of the paper are not trimmed. Stained with dampness. Mildewed. Origin: According to colophon of first text, this was copied on Monday 10 Rabīʻ al-Ākhar 590 [April 4, 1194] (fol. 12a).
author: Khāzin, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan, fl. 1030
abstract: Collection of two treatises on aromatic substances. Incomplete at end and beginning.
contents: 2. fol. 13a-26b: Kitāb Yūḥannā Ibn Māsawayh fī jawāhir al-ṭīb al-mufradah bi-asmāʾihā wa-ṣifātihā wa-maʻādinihā / Ibn Māsawayh.
extent: 26 leaves: paper ; 170 x 125 (125 x 85) mm. bound to 175 x 130 mm.
title: Kitāb al-Ṭīb. Kitāb Yūḥannā Ibn Māsawayh fī jawāhir al-ṭīb al-mufradah bi-asmāʾihā wa-ṣifātihā wa-maʻādinihā.
creator: خازن، محمد بن الحسن
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
